nodes.text: A'Yark was a Tusken Raider who was the chief of a tribe around the time of 0 BBY. The warrior had only one eye; the missing eye was covered by a red crystal.

A'Yark was first mentioned in the Star Wars canon in the short story "Rites," written by John Jackson Miller. A'Yark was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends novel Kenobi, written also by John Jackson Miller.
